title: Definition of a Stem-and-Leaf Plot
text: A stem-and-leaf graph (also known as a stemplot) is used for exploratory data analysis. On the "leaf" side of the table, we will list out the final significant digit (the last digit important to the data set). All other digits go in the "stem" side of the table. For instance, $$23$$ has stem $$2$$ and leaf 3; $$5432$$ has stem $$543$$ and leaf 2; $$9.3$$ has stem $$9$$ and leaf $$3$$.
speech: A stem-and-leaf graph (also known as a stemplot) is used for exploratory data analysis. On the "leaf" side of the table, we will list out the final significant digit (the last digit important to the data set). All other digits go in the "stem" side of the table. For instance,  23  has stem  2  and leaf 3:  5432  has stem  543  and leaf 2:  9.3  has stem  9  and leaf  3 .

title: Identifying the Correct Stems
text: Which two stem-and-leaf graphs include all the stems required for this question?

subHints.title: Identifying the Correct Stems
subHints.text: Which two stem-and-leaf graphs include stems from $$3$$ (for data points in the 30s) to $$10$$ (for data points in the 100s)?

speech: Which two stem-and-leaf graphs include all the stems required for this question?
pacedSpeech: Which two stem-and-leaf graphs include all the stems required for this question?

title: Duplicates in Stem-and-Leaf
text: All data points will be visible in the stem-and-leaf graph, even duplicates. For instance, if $$94$$ appears twice in the given data set, it will appear twice in the stem-and-leaf graph as well.
speech: All data points will be visible in the stem-and-leaf graph, even duplicates. For instance, if  94  appears twice in the given data set, it will appear twice in the stem-and-leaf graph as well.

title: Identifying the Correct Stem-and-Leaf Graph
text: Which graph includes all the correct data values for the given data?
speech: Which graph includes all the correct data values for the given data?
pacedSpeech: Which graph includes all the correct data values for the given data?

title: Identifying the Correct Stem-and-Leaf Graph
text: Which graph includes all the duplicates? For instance, $$49$$, $$55$$, $$68$$, and $$69$$ should appear twice in the graph while $$88$$ should appear three times and $$94$$ four times.
speech: Which graph includes all the duplicates? For instance,  49 ,  55 ,  68 , and  69  should appear twice in the graph while  88  should appear three times and  94  four times.
